Transcription for 19551

The houses that have been built on the site have been designed by the Welsh Assembly Government
and Plannigwen County Borough Council in association with the Building Research Establishment.
They held a competition for architects to design housing for the site. They ultimate 85% less carbon
emissions than the average house. The house will be using renewable resources to decrease carbon
footprint. This saves both money and the environment and costs the same as a standard home to buy and live in.
